short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights all links on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension performs one simple task: it highlights all the links on current page in your browser. Just check the "Highlight links" checkbox and they'll start to blink, showing themselves. Uncheck that box to reset page to default state.
